query: Can you help me put together a 3-day travel plan for 2 people, departing from Salt Lake City and heading to Twin Falls, taking place from March 25th to March 27th, 2022? Our budget is $1,600. Regarding dining options, we are interested in enjoying both Chinese and Mexican meals.
